title: Braskem Makes Interest Payment on Pandemic-Era Hybrid Bonds
description: Brazilian petrochemical giant Braskem SA paid interest due Friday on its so-called hybrid bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: Brazilian petrochemical giant Braskem SA paid interest due Friday on its so-called hybrid bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.
